title: Apple will soon require developers to submit apps to the App Store using Xcode 13
content:
Apple on Tuesday sent a reminder to developers about an upcoming change in the requirements for submitting apps to the App Store. Starting April 25, 2022, all apps created for Apple’s platforms must be built with Xcode 13 – the latest version of the SDK available.

more…

The post Apple will soon require developers to submit apps to the App Store using Xcode 13 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple sent a reminder to developers about an upcoming change that will require apps to be built with Xcode 13.
